segments.text: John , you look pale . What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you have something on your mind ? You look so concerned ! Maybe I can help you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will , I'm under a lot of pressure . My manager is very pushy . He assigned me two projects . Now the deadlines are near but I have finished neither of them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess no one can help me but myself . For the moment , I just need someone to talk to so that I can relieve my stress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know your feeling . Take it easy and say something to me if you like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , buddy , you are so kind . Thank you !
segments.speaker: S2
